G

Game - Class in nhamilton.game
Main class for the game, updating and rendering is done here.
Game() - Constructor for class nhamilton.game.Game
Constructs class, sets frame rate to maximum and updates to 60Hz.
GameLoop - Class in nhamilton.game
Main loop of the game.
GameLoop(double, double) - Constructor for class nhamilton.game.GameLoop
Initializes the game loop.
genBlankWorld() - Method in class nhamilton.game.level.Level
Creates a new tile map, and fills it with ID 0.
getColorCode() - Method in class nhamilton.game.level.Tile
Returns the color of the tile in hex.
getCurrentFPS() - Method in class nhamilton.game.GameLoop
Returns the current FPS.
getCurrentUPS() - Method in class nhamilton.game.GameLoop
Returns the current updates per second.
getData() - Method in class nhamilton.game.GameLoop
Prints the current frame rate and update rate.
getEntityType(int) - Method in class nhamilton.game.entity.EntityManager
Returns a registered EntityType with the ID 'id'.
getEntityType(String) - Method in class nhamilton.game.entity.EntityManager
